reasoning: Aggregate BOTEC estimate summing major pelvic cancers: ovarian (~11 per 100k women), endometrial (~6 per 100k women), cervical (~6 per 100k women), bladder (~9 per 100k), testicular (~5 per 100k men), prostate (~25 per 100k men, screening-dependent).
